Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Selena

Entry.JapaneseText: 王の盾兵
Entry.EnglishText: Royal Shield Knight

Entry.JapaneseText: <Mao>
Entry.EnglishText: <Mao>

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ
Entry.EnglishText: Walto

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>

Entry.JapaneseText: <Eugene>
Entry.EnglishText: <Eugene>

Entry.JapaneseText: 女の人
Entry.EnglishText: Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト
Entry.EnglishText: Milhaust

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: おばあさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Woman

Entry.JapaneseText: おじいさん
Entry.EnglishText: Old Man

Entry.JapaneseText: 旅人
Entry.EnglishText: Traveler

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラード港
Entry.EnglishText: Babilograd Harbor

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴ーッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Selena!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: どこから来やがった！ リフトは閉鎖中のはずだぞ!?
Entry.EnglishText: How the hell did you get here?! The lift shouldn't be in operation!

Entry.JapaneseText: その人たちは返してもらうヨ!!
Entry.EnglishText: We've come to take those girls back!

Entry.JapaneseText: レディたちの前で 騒ぎは困りますな。
Entry.EnglishText: Please refrain from causing a ruckus in front of the ladies.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa!

Entry.JapaneseText: 手を尽くしたつもりでしたが…… 隊長がこれほど早くこの街に お見えになるとは……計算外でした。
Entry.EnglishText: I had everything planned out so thoroughly, but for the Commander to arrive here with such haste was certainly... unexpected.

Entry.JapaneseText: もう少し着くのが遅かったら、 おまえがここで動き回っていた事すら わからなくなっていただろうな。
Entry.EnglishText: Had we shown up just a bit later, we probably wouldn't have even been aware that you had been up to anything here.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、私は私の仕事を 完遂させていただきますよ、隊長。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I will see to it that my mission is completed, Commander.

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は争いを望んでいるわけではない。 手を引け、ワルトゥ!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm not looking for a fight. Stand down, Walto!

Entry.JapaneseText: 我らの任務は、彼女たちを 女王陛下のもとへ無事に送り届ける事。 任務の放棄は、王国への反逆を意味します。 私が王国を裏切るとお思いですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Our mission is to safely deliver these girls into the hands of Her Majesty the Queen. Abandoning that mission would be the same as treason. Do you take me for a traitor?

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな事をして何になる、ワルトゥ！ これが国のためになるというのか!?
Entry.EnglishText: What purpose does this serve, Walto? How is this supposed to benefit our kingdom?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私もこのようなやり方を 望んでなどいません。
Entry.EnglishText: This is not the way I would have chosen to do things.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし、事は急を要するとの ご下命を賜った以上、些細な事に 気を配っている余裕はないのです。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I do not have the luxury to be concerned with trivial matters when entrusted with such an urgent task.

Entry.JapaneseText: だったら、こっちも 力ずくで奪い返すだけだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Then we'll do whatever we have to in order to get those girls back!

Entry.JapaneseText: うおりゃぁァァッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Oooryah!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴、大丈夫か！ さあ、こっちへ来るんだ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Sis, are you okay? Here, come to me!

Entry.JapaneseText: か、体が……動かない!!
Entry.EnglishText: I-I can't...move my body!

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様ら、姉貴に ナニしやがった!?
Entry.EnglishText: What the hell did you bastards do to my sister?!

Entry.JapaneseText: お願いをしただけですよ。 しばらく動かないでほしい、と。
Entry.EnglishText: I merely requested something of her. I asked that she would not move for a little while.

Entry.JapaneseText: なにぃ!?
Entry.EnglishText: What?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 急を要するとの命を受けたとはいえ、 手荒な真似は出来る限り避けたいのです。 皆さんもお引取り願えますか？
Entry.EnglishText: Although my mission is of grave importance, I would nonetheless prefer to avoid bloodshed. Would you mind leaving us be?

Entry.JapaneseText: ……はァっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Hiyah!

Entry.JapaneseText: それとも…… 我らを倒して彼女たちを助けますか？ もっとも、ここで戦えば彼女たちは無事では 済みますまい……動けないのですからね。
Entry.EnglishText: So then... You want to try defeating us and rescuing these girls? There is no certainty that they would walk away from a battle here unharmed... They are immobile, after all.

Entry.JapaneseText: この、卑怯者が!!
Entry.EnglishText: You coward!!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……おまえらしからぬ やり方だな。
Entry.EnglishText: ...You don't normally go this far.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は任務遂行のためなら 手段を選ばない。 これは遊びではないのですよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I will use everything at my disposal to accomplish this mission. Do keep in mind that this is not a game.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦いなさい、<Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: Fight him, <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴!?
Entry.EnglishText: Selena?!

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな奴らの言いなりになってはダメよ。 あなたたちが命を賭けて戦うのなら、 私も命を賭けるわ！
Entry.EnglishText: You can't just let him order you around like that! If you're going to put your lives on the line, then so will I!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私も覚悟はできてます!!
Entry.EnglishText: I'm prepared for anything as well!

Entry.JapaneseText: 戦ってください！ お願いします！
Entry.EnglishText: Please fight them! Please!

Entry.JapaneseText: だけど……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: このままでは、どのみち 彼女たちを救う事はできない。 ……やるぞ！ <Tytree>!!
Entry.EnglishText: Fighting is our only hope of saving them, given our current situation. Let's do it, <Tytree>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 穏便に話をつけたかったのですが、 そうもいかないようですね。 ……いいでしょう。
Entry.EnglishText: I tried to settle this peacefully, but it appears that was in vain... Very well.

Entry.JapaneseText: ただ、本当に彼女たちを 傷つけてしまっては、 私の立つ瀬がありません。 ミリッツァ。
Entry.EnglishText: However, it would be quite a problem for me if any harm truly befalls these girls. ...Militsa.

Entry.JapaneseText: わかっている。
Entry.EnglishText: Understood.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ……どうして…… こんな事したって、 純粋な<Yellow>ヒト<White>の身体なんて 手に入らないのよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa... why? You must realize that doing these things isn't going to give you a <Yellow>pure body<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: 言ったはずだ…… <Blue>王の盾<White>以外に 私の居場所はないと……
Entry.EnglishText: I told you before, I have nowhere to go besides the <Blue>Royal Shield<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: それともおまえは…… ハーフの居場所を見つけた とでもいうのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Or do you mean to tell me... that you've found a place where we Halfs are truly accepted?

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、それは……
Entry.EnglishText: No, I just...

Entry.JapaneseText: 退け、ワルトゥ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Stand down, Walto!

Entry.JapaneseText: お見事でした、隊長…… しかし、任務は必ず遂行します。
Entry.EnglishText: That was truly magnificent, Commander... However, I will not fail my mission.

Entry.JapaneseText: ワルトゥ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Walto...!

Entry.JapaneseText: しばらく…… 意識を失って頂きますよ。
Entry.EnglishText: I am going to have you stay down for a while.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……頭が……
Entry.EnglishText: Agh! My head...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴ィィィィィッ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Selenaaa!!

Entry.JapaneseText: 何事だ！
Entry.EnglishText: What's going on here?

Entry.JapaneseText: ずいぶんと騒がしいではないか。 ワルトゥよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You're causing quite the commotion, Walto.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミルハウスト将軍……
Entry.EnglishText: General Milhaust...

Entry.JapaneseText: あいつは……
Entry.EnglishText: Who is he...?

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア王国軍の将軍、 ミルハウスト・セルカークだよ。
Entry.EnglishText: He's the General of the Callegean Army, Milhaust Selkirk.

Entry.JapaneseText: 軍に入隊してすぐに頭角を現し、 その手腕と人望を買われて、 若くして将軍になった、 エリート中のエリートさ。
Entry.EnglishText: He made a name for himself soon after joining the army. Despite his young age, he became a general in no time thanks to his skills and popularity. He's an elite among the elite.

Entry.JapaneseText: バビログラードの動向が 慌しいと聞きおもむいてみれば、 民間人を巻き込んでのこの騒ぎ。 何をしている？ 説明しろ。
Entry.EnglishText: I heard that there was a disturbance in Babilograd and here I find you getting into an altercation with civilians. What is the meaning of this? Explain yourself!

Entry.JapaneseText: 恐れながら、我ら<Blue>王の盾<White>の 任務はアガーテ様の勅命。 陛下の許可なくして 私が語る事はありません。
Entry.EnglishText: I mean no disrespect to you, but the <Blue>Royal Shield's<White> mission is a direct request from Queen Agarte. Unless Her Majesty wills it, I cannot divulge any information to you.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……そうだったな。 ならば、陛下に直接 うかがうまでの事。
Entry.EnglishText: ...Is that so? If that's the case, then I will discuss the matter with Her Majesty in person.

Entry.JapaneseText: だが、ここは退け。 私の目の前で民を傷つける事は許さん。 私が忠誠を誓ったカレギアはすなわち、 カレギアの民そのものでもある。
Entry.EnglishText: However, I want you to withdraw from here. I won't allow civilians to be harmed before my very eyes. The oath of allegiance I swore to Callegea was an oath to her people as well.

Entry.JapaneseText: しかし……
Entry.EnglishText: But...

Entry.JapaneseText: どうしてもと言うのならば、 私が相手になろう。
Entry.EnglishText: If you continue to press the matter, then I shall be your next opponent.

Entry.JapaneseText: そこまで申されるならば…… 承知いたしました。 隊長、後ほどお会いしましょう。
Entry.EnglishText: If it means avoiding needless confrontation, then I will go no further. Until next time, Commander.

Entry.JapaneseText: ミリッツァ！
Entry.EnglishText: Militsa!

Entry.JapaneseText: 久しぶりだな、ミルハウスト……
Entry.EnglishText: It's been awhile, Milhaust.

Entry.JapaneseText: ……以前は国のために 尽力し合った仲とはいえ、 あなたは国と袂を分かった。 語る事など……
Entry.EnglishText: We may have once fought together as brothers in arms, but you no longer have any ties to the Kingdom. We have nothing to discuss.

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか…… だが、かつての同志として ひとつだけ忠告する。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I see. However, as a former ally of yours, there's one piece of advice I'd like to give you.

Entry.JapaneseText: 一刻も早く、女王陛下のもとへ行け。 そして、何が起こっているのか、 おまえの目で確かめて欲しい。
Entry.EnglishText: Return to the Queen's side as soon as possible. Whatever is happening, I want you to see it with your own eyes.

Entry.JapaneseText: おまえには真実が見えるはずだ。
Entry.EnglishText: You should be able to figure out the truth.

Entry.JapaneseText: 互いの刃を交える日が 来ない事を、俺は切に願う。
Entry.EnglishText: ...I hope the day we cross our blades never comes. I mean it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 待って……！ ミルハウストさんよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wait...! Mr. Milhaust!

Entry.JapaneseText: みんなを助けてくれて、 ありがとうよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you so much for saving everyone!

Entry.JapaneseText: 皆さん、大丈夫ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: Is everyone all right?

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ、みんな無事よ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, we're all unharmed.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴、この人たちはみんな、 ヤツらにさらわれて来たんだよな？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey sis, were all of you captured by those guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: そうよ。 それで山の上の聖殿に閉じ込められていたの。 私たち以外にも、大勢の女の子たちがいたわ。
Entry.EnglishText: Yes. They had us locked up in the shrine at the top of the mountain. There were many other girls trapped there besides us.

Entry.JapaneseText: なあ、その中に<Claire>って 名前の娘はいなかったかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Was a girl named <Claire> there as well?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>!?
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>?!

Entry.JapaneseText: 知ってるんだな、姉貴？
Entry.EnglishText: So you do know her, then?

Entry.JapaneseText: でも、どうしてあなたが その名前を？
Entry.EnglishText: Yes, but, how would you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: こいつの…… <Veigue>の恋…… もとい、友達なんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: She's <Veigue>'s girlfr-ah, sorry, friend.

Entry.JapaneseText: そう……でも、<Claire>さんは 他の娘たちと一緒に 連れていかれたわ……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... But they've already taken <Claire> along with the rest of the girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>はいつ、ここから 連れていかれたんですか!?
Entry.EnglishText: When did they take her?!

Entry.JapaneseText: ほんの二、三日前の事よ。
Entry.EnglishText: Two, maybe three days ago.

Entry.JapaneseText: くっ!!
Entry.EnglishText: Tch!

Entry.JapaneseText: 奴らはなぜあなたたちを さらったのか、何か話を していませんでしたか？
Entry.EnglishText: Why were you kidnapped? They didn't tell you anything?

Entry.JapaneseText: いいえ、何も…… ただ、ひとつだけ 気になる事が……
Entry.EnglishText: No, nothing. Although, there was one thing that stuck out to me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 気になる事？
Entry.EnglishText: Which was?

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖殿にいる時に、 外から聞こえて来たんです。 「もう時間がない。月が満ちる」……って。
Entry.EnglishText: When we were at the shrine, I heard a voice coming from outside saying, "We're running out of time. The full moon is almost upon us."

Entry.JapaneseText: 月が満ちる……満月の日に 何かが起こるというの？
Entry.EnglishText: The full moon? Is something going to happen on the day of the full moon?

Entry.JapaneseText: ごめんなさい、 そこまでは……
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry, that's the only thing I'd heard...

Entry.JapaneseText: 確か、次の満月は <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>の夜ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: If I'm not mistaken, the next full moon is on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>, isn't it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Blue>ゴルドバの日<White>には お披露目の儀式があるんだヨ！
Entry.EnglishText: The inauguration ceremony will be held on the <Blue>Day of Goldba<White>!

Entry.JapaneseText: やはり、一連の<Blue>王の盾<White>の行動と 儀式には関連があるようだな。
Entry.EnglishText: Then it looks like there really is a connection between the <Blue>Royal Shield's<White> actions and the ceremony.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Claire>……
Entry.EnglishText: <Claire>...

Entry.JapaneseText: 急ごう!!
Entry.EnglishText: Let's hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴、悪いけど…… おれは一緒には帰れない。 他の娘たちを助けるまでは 手放しで喜ぶ気にはなれないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Sorry sis, but... I can't go home with you. I wouldn't be able to rest easy knowing that the other girls are still in trouble.

Entry.JapaneseText: ええ。わかってるわ。 一緒に帰るなんて言ったら、 私に怒られるトコだったわよ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, I understand. I'd have gotten mad if you said you wanted to head back with me.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴…… 行って来ます。
Entry.EnglishText: Selena... I'll see you later.

Entry.JapaneseText: 気をつけるのよ。 みなさんも、お気をつけて。 <Tytree>をよろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: Be careful. That goes for the rest of you, too. Please keep a good eye on <Tytree> for me!

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当に、皆さん、 ありがとうございます。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you very much, everyone.

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当は男の方にも直接お礼を 言いたいのですが……
Entry.EnglishText: I'd really like to thank the men directly, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: こういう時、戒律って 少しもどかしいですね。
Entry.EnglishText: At times like this, the commandments are a bit frustrating to work with.

Entry.JapaneseText: どうやら、彼女も この街の娘のようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: Looks like she's a girl from this city, then...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律だネ。 この街の人だったみたい……
Entry.EnglishText: That's the commandments, alright. So she's from the city...

Entry.JapaneseText: そうか…… 彼女もこの街の娘か……
Entry.EnglishText: I see... A girl from Babilograd.

Entry.JapaneseText: おっと、戒律って事か？
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right, the commandments are still in effect.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが必ず 助けに来てくれる…… クレアさんはそう信じていました。
Entry.EnglishText: You'd always come to our rescue... Claire never stopped believing that.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが<Veigue>さん…… クレアが話してました。
Entry.EnglishText: So you're <Veigue>... Claire told me about you.

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたが絶対助けに 来てくれるって……
Entry.EnglishText: She said you'd definitely come save us...

Entry.JapaneseText: クレア……
Entry.EnglishText: Claire...

Entry.JapaneseText: 助けられた今でも 一体、何があったのか さっぱりわかりませんが……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though everyone here is safe, I have no idea what'll happen or what to do next...

Entry.JapaneseText: でもそんな事は どうでもいいんです。 本当に、ありがとうございました。
Entry.EnglishText: But what matters is that you came. Really, thank you from the bottom of my heart.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の事なら心配はいらないわ。 クレアさんや他の娘たちを 助ける事だけ考えなさい。
Entry.EnglishText: You don't have to worry about me. Just focus on helping Claire and the other girls.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私の事なら心配しないで。 今のあなたには、もっと 大切な事があるんだもの。
Entry.EnglishText: If it's about me, don't worry. There are more important things for you to do right now.

Entry.JapaneseText: 仲間のために戦うっていう 大切な使命がね。
Entry.EnglishText: Fighting alongside your friends, for example.

Entry.JapaneseText: 姉貴……
Entry.EnglishText: Sis...

Entry.JapaneseText: がんばってきなさい、 <Tytree>。
Entry.EnglishText: Good luck with that, <Tytree>.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ、がんばるさ！ 姉貴も気をつけてな。
Entry.EnglishText: Yeah, I'll do my best! Take care of yourself, sis.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちみんな、 クレアに励まされました。
Entry.EnglishText: We were all encouraged by Claire to keep going.

Entry.JapaneseText: もしクレアと会えたら、 また会いたい…… そう言っていたと伝えてください。
Entry.EnglishText: I'd like to ser her again... If you meet up with her, please tell her that, if you could.

Entry.JapaneseText: あまり頼りにならない 弟かもしれませんが……
Entry.EnglishText: He may not be a very dependable brother, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 少しでも皆さんの力になれれば…… よろしくお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: I hope he can help you all in some small way... Thank you for fighting alongside him.

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: 人々は祈っている……
Entry.EnglishText: People are praying...

Entry.JapaneseText: この国に生きる<Yellow>ヒト<White>を守る。 それが我らの使命だ。
Entry.EnglishText: Protecting the <Yellow>People<White> living in this country. That is our mission.

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスが大量発生している。 充分注意するんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: There's a large number of Birus outbreaks. Be very careful!

Entry.JapaneseText: 結局、ヒューマの連中は 単に祭司の座をガジュマに 渡したくないだけなんだよ!!
Entry.EnglishText: After all, the Huma simply does not want to hand over the position of priest to Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律か……
Entry.EnglishText: Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか……戒律のせいで しゃべれないんだったネ。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh right... Can't speak because of the commandments.

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、男とは 話せないようだな……
Entry.EnglishText: It seems that you can't talk to men because of the commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律……ですね。
Entry.EnglishText: Oh, the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: そっか、戒律が あったんだったな……
Entry.EnglishText: Man... So we really can't talk because of the Commandments...

Entry.JapaneseText: 戒律のせいで、女と 話せないんだったわね……
Entry.EnglishText: Because of the commandments, you aren't allowed to talk to women...

Entry.JapaneseText: ワシは山の上に住んでいたんだが、 ヒューマに追い出されたんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I used to live at the peak of the mountains, but the Huma forced me out...
Entry.Notes: rewrote the line. dunno where the dupe is. -dragon.

Entry.JapaneseText: 貴様ら…… ヒューマのせいで……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Those foul people... If it wasn't for those Huma...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 「潮は引き、潮は満ちる…… 人の心が波に流されても 私は流される事はない……」
Entry.EnglishText: "The tide ebbs and the tide rises... When a person's heart is swept away, by the waves, I will not be swayed."

Entry.JapaneseText: 「私は波間をさすらう小船。 流されているのではない。 ただ……浮かんでいるだけ……」
Entry.EnglishText: "I am but a small boat drifting through the waves. I'm not being swept away. Just floating atop the sea..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… つれづれなるままに、 想いを詩にする心の旅人……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. I am a traveler of the heart who writes poems about my thoughts as I go along.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「憎しみは愛の背中…… 愛は憎しみの花……」
Entry.EnglishText: "Hate and love share the same fate... As love is that which blooms hate..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 「失恋は種を落とし、 恋の芽が大地に息吹く……」
Entry.EnglishText: "Heartbreak begets seeds, from which the bud of love starts to breathe..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… 哀しき恋を詩にする、 さすらいのフラレ虫……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. I am a wandering flounder who writes poems about the sadness of love.

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ひとつの終わりは ひと抱えの始まりを」
Entry.EnglishText: "Each solution has a beginning..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ひとつの悲しみは ひと抱えの喜びをもたらす。 空は笑って見ている……」
Entry.EnglishText: "Each sorrow brings a joy. The sky smiles down upon me..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… 地鳴りが耳をふさごうと、 私は歌い続けるだけ……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. Even though the earth rumbles in my ears, I just keep on singing...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ひとつの終わりは ひと抱えの始まりを」
Entry.EnglishText: "Each solution has a beginning..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 「ひとつの悲しみは ひと抱えの喜びをもたらす。 空は笑って見ている……」
Entry.EnglishText: "Each sorrow brings a joy. The sky smiles down upon me..."

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… <Mao>とかいう歌好きに負けず、 歌い続けるだけ……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. As long as songlovers like <Mao> continue to sing along...

Entry.JapaneseText: 「我が愛よ、君に届け。 我が心よ、君を救え。 我が祈り、君を守れ。」
Entry.EnglishText: "My love, send it to you. My heart, to save you. My prayer, protect you."

Entry.JapaneseText: 「我は愛されずとも…… 我は愛し続ける…… それが愛の極意と見つけたり……」
Entry.EnglishText: "I may not be loved... Yet I continue to love... That's how I found... the secret of love."

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… フラレ続け知った真の愛。 愛の光が今、世界に満ちている……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. The true love that I have endured through countless rejections. The light of love now fills the world...

Entry.JapaneseText: 私は詩人…… 詩だけが私の心を いやしてくれる……
Entry.EnglishText: I am... a poet. Only poetry can heal this heart of mine...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
